mailSubject: Updated Checklist and PEP Screening Data for J.P. Morgan Securities PLC
mailBody:
Dear Client,

I hope this message finds you well.

Please find below the finalized checklist for J.P. Morgan Securities PLC, which includes the status of various verification items and the results of the recent PEP screening analysis.

| Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey | Validated  | Annual accounts and Ellipro Survey data available for 2020-2022.               | DIM_CompanyAnnualAccountsAndElliproSurvey |
| Company Bank and Postal Details       | Validated  | Bank account and postal details confirmed.                                     | DIM_CompanyBankAndPostalDetails |
| Company Directorship                  | Pending    | No additional details found for directorship verification; supplementary data unavailable. | DIM_CompanyDirectorship |
| Company Tax Documentation             | Validated  | Tax documentation verified; taxes paid across multiple jurisdictions.          | RagAgent            |
| Company Regulatory Compliance         | Validated  | Compliance confirmed across multiple regulatory spheres.                       | RagAgent            |
| Company Business Scope                | Validated  | Business scope verified; global operations and diverse services.               | RagAgent            |
| Company PEP Screening                 | Validated  | PEP screening data analyzed and verified; high-risk individuals identified.     | Provided Attachment |
| Company Revenue Details               | Validated  | Revenue data available for 2021-2023; record growth confirmed.                 | RagAgent            |
| Company Market Capitalization Details | Validated  | Market capitalization data available for 2021-2023.                            | RagAgent            |
